Question: This person befriended Locke's husband and purchased a house in Crescent Heights for Anderson and his male lover.
Hints: The Rawhide years (1959–65) were some of the most grueling of this person's career.
Richard Burton played the squad's commander, with this person as his right-hand man.
This person then branched out to star in the only musical of his career, Paint Your Wagon (1969).
